movies.title: Oppenheimer
movies.description: A deep dive into the life of J. Robert Oppenheimer, the physicist behind the Manhattan Project. The film explores his moral struggles, the scientific breakthroughs that led to the atomic bomb, and the consequences of his work. As the world enters the nuclear age, Oppenheimer grapples with his role in history.
movies.phrase: The man who built the bomb.

movies.title: Tenet
movies.description: A secret agent is tasked with preventing World War III using time-inversion technology. As he navigates a world where time flows in different directions, he must uncover the mysteries behind a global conspiracy. The mission takes him through breathtaking action sequences, mind-bending paradoxes, and intense espionage.
movies.phrase: Don’t try to understand it. Feel it.

movies.title: Dunkirk
movies.description: The film depicts the harrowing events of the Dunkirk evacuation during World War II. Through the perspectives of land, sea, and air, soldiers fight to survive while civilians rally to rescue them. Christopher Nolan delivers an immersive cinematic experience with minimal dialogue and a gripping score.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A group of explorers ventures beyond our solar system through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet. Led by Cooper, a former NASA pilot, they face time dilation, alien landscapes, and emotional dilemmas. A stunning journey through space, love, and the survival of humankind.
movies.phrase: Mankind’s next home is among the stars.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.description: Eight years after the Joker’s reign, Gotham faces a new threat—Bane, a ruthless terrorist with a grand plan. Bruce Wayne must emerge from exile and don the Batman cape once more. A thrilling finale to Christopher Nolan’s Dark Knight trilogy.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief who specializes in extracting secrets from dreams is given a daunting task: implant an idea instead. As he navigates the layers of the subconscious, reality and illusion blur in a cinematic masterpiece of mind-bending storytelling.
movies.phrase: Your mind is the scene of the crime.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces his greatest challenge yet when the Joker, a sadistic criminal mastermind, wreaks havoc in Gotham City. With chaos on every corner, Bruce Wayne must balance his duties as a vigilante with his responsibilities to his loved ones. A gripping tale of morality, heroism, and sacrifice.

movies.title: Batman Begins
movies.description: Witness the origin story of Bruce Wayne as he transforms into Batman. Trained by Ra’s al Ghul and armed with determination, he returns to Gotham to fight corruption, crime, and his own fears. A gritty exploration of a hero’s first steps.
movies.phrase: The journey of a hero begins.

movies.title: Iron Man
movies.description: Tony Stark, a genius billionaire, must rely on his intellect and a self-made suit of armor to escape captivity and confront a growing threat. This is the birth of Iron Man, a hero who will redefine the meaning of responsibility.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth’s mightiest heroes must unite to face an unprecedented alien invasion. With personalities clashing and trust in short supply, they must learn to work as a team. A thrilling adventure that changed the superhero genre forever.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.description: A brilliant surgeon’s life changes forever after a car accident shatters his hands. Seeking healing, he stumbles upon a hidden world of mystic arts and alternate dimensions. With new powers, Stephen Strange must choose between his ego and his role as Earth’s protector.

movies.title: FHI
movies.description: On planet Math, only students who excel at math can exist. Agent Kim, along with Agent Choi and Agent Choi, are on a mission to hunt down two illegal test-answer dealers and transform them into good students. The illegal dealers don’t study at all and are very bad at math. They are on the verge of breaking the planet’s system by simply existing. Time is running short...

tvShows.title: Arcane S1
tvShows.description: Set in the League of Legends universe, Arcane explores the origins of iconic champions Vi and Jinx. As tensions rise between the utopian city of Piltover and the oppressed undercity of Zaun, two sisters find themselves on opposing sides of a brewing conflict. Stunning animation and deep storytelling make this a must-watch.
tvShows.phrase: Power. Real power, doesn’t come to those who were born strongest.

tvShows.title: Arcane S2
tvShows.description: The story continues as the fallout from the events of Season 1 reshapes Piltover and Zaun. New alliances are forged, and betrayals deepen as characters navigate a world on the brink of war. With stunning visuals and an expanding narrative, Arcane S2 raises the stakes in every way.

tvShows.title: Cyberpunk Edgerunners
tvShows.description: Set in the chaotic world of Night City, Edgerunners follows a street kid named David who fights to survive. After a personal tragedy, he implants cybernetic enhancements and joins a crew of mercenaries. The show delivers an emotional and action-packed journey through the brutal realities of a cyberpunk dystopia.
tvShows.phrase: If I gotta die, I’m gonna make sure they remember me.

tvShows.title: Game of Thrones S1
tvShows.description: Noble families clash for power while dark forces rise beyond the Wall. In a land where seasons last for decades, loyalties are tested and betrayal is everywhere. Game of Thrones S1 is a gripping start to a legendary saga.

tvShows.title: Squid Game S1
tvShows.description: Desperate for money, hundreds of contestants enter a deadly competition of children’s games for a massive cash prize. As alliances form and dissolve, contestants must outsmart, outlast, and overcome their moral limits. A chilling commentary on survival and greed.

tvShows.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure S2
tvShows.description: The Joestar bloodline continues as new heroes take on the fight against supernatural foes. With the introduction of Stands, the battle mechanics evolve into a strategic and thrilling experience. The stakes are higher, the enemies deadlier, and the adventures more bizarre than ever before.
tvShows.phrase: A new generation, a new Stand, the same bizarre adventure.
